Text.Name: Boss_Xiongfeng_huoling
Text.Desc: Phoenix concentrates the power of Fire Spirit until it reaches 100 stacks, by which time it unleash Flame Feather and enters into the Inferno Form.

Text.Name: Boss_Xiongfeng_Huofeng
Text.Desc: Phoenix keeps consuming Fire Spirits while in Inferno Form. When it ends, recover the remaining fire feathers and restore Qi.

Text.Name: Boss_Xiongfeng_rongjin
Text.Desc: Deals damage after a period of time. Non-Metal cultivators only receive 1/3 of the damage.
